thread.title: Hate Crime Victims Offered Help at Central Station (Glasgow City Council)
thread.title_full: Hate Crime Victims Offered Help at Central Station (Glasgow City Council) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Hate Crime Victims Offered Help at Central Station (Glasgow City Council)
text: ( Source : Glasgow City Council ) Victims of Hate Crime are being urged to report incidents to staff at Scotland's busiest train station. Central Station will today (Oct 12th) become the first station in Scotland to become a Third Party
